description: Contains subscription information including plan details, pricing, and churn status. Links customers to their subscription plans and tracks active vs churned subscriptions.

columns.name: customer_id
columns.description: Foreign key reference to customers table

columns.name: mrr
columns.description: Monthly recurring revenue for this subscription in USD

columns.name: end_date
columns.description: Date when the subscription ended (NULL if still active)

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the subscription record was created
